url.description: Url for file upload. To upload file, Http PUT request with header 'x-ms-blob-type' : 'BlockBlob' can be issued.

expires_in_seconds.description: Time till token expiration. If upload cannot be made in time, new token must be requested.

jet_file_id.description: An identification assigned by Jet to track the file.  This identification is used to retrieve the file upload details including processing errors
